product_name: Wasatch Powder Monkeys Cargo Box Adapter Kit - Large
long_description: The large Wasatch Powder Monkeys Cargo Box Adapter Kit makes popular cargo boxes from Yakima, Thule and Inno compatible with the Wasatch Powder Monkeys Switchblade Crossbars (sold separately).
short_description: The large Wasatch Powder Monkeys Cargo Box Adapter Kit makes popular cargo boxes from Yakima, Thule and Inno compatible with the Wasatch Powder Monkeys Switchblade Crossbars (sold separately).
